The animated Microsoft CEO ends that quote by saying we haven't done as good a job drawing in that broader set of demographics. Steve Ballmer also says the Xbox 360 ''isn't a gaming console,'' but ''a family entertainment center'' and ''a place to socialize.''

Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had ''severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. Sea Gals

. Alyse Eady performed her musical ventriloquist act, ''I Want to Be a Cowboy's Sweetheart,'' for the pageant crowd. Her platform in the Miss Arkansas and Miss America pageants highlighted the issue of Developing Leaders: Boys& Girls Clubs of America. Since the pageant, Alyse Eady , 22, has continued to be presented to the public with appearances scheduled on Late Show With David Letterman and Inside Edition on CBS and on the MSNBC cable news network.
